JTrim 2.0.5 - All modules

Packages
Package
Description
org.jtrim2.access
Contains classes and interfaces for managing concurrent access to limited resources.
org.jtrim2.cache
Contains classes for caching Java objects.
org.jtrim2.cancel
Defines classes and interface related to canceling tasks or other operations.
org.jtrim2.collections
Defines collection interfaces, implementations and methods not provided by the java.util package.
org.jtrim2.concurrent
Defines commonly used concurrency utility classes.
org.jtrim2.concurrent.collections
Defines thread-safe collection interfaces and implementations.
org.jtrim2.concurrent.query
Contains classes and interfaces for asynchronous data retrieval.
org.jtrim2.concurrent.query.io
Contains classes and interface to asynchronously read from channels and streams.
org.jtrim2.event
Contains classes and interfaces for dispatching and handling event notifications.
org.jtrim2.event.track
Defines event handler utility classes for tracking events through executors.
org.jtrim2.executor
Contains classes and interfaces for executing tasks asynchronously.
org.jtrim2.image
Defines classes for storing information about images.
org.jtrim2.image.async
Contains classes for asynchronously retrieving images.
org.jtrim2.image.transform
Contains various image transformations, mostly to support TransformedImageDisplay.
org.jtrim2.logs
Contains useful utility methods for logging (mostly for testing purposes).
org.jtrim2.property
Contains convenience classes for defining properties able to notify clients of changes.
org.jtrim2.property.swing
Contains methods and classes for manipulating and accessing Swing components as JTrim properties.
org.jtrim2.stream
Contains classes and interfaces for synchronous stream processing.
org.jtrim2.swing.component
Contains classes and interfaces related to swing components.
org.jtrim2.swing.concurrent
Contains classes and interface to help with executing tasks of Swing applications concurrently.
org.jtrim2.swing.concurrent.query
Contains classes and interfaces related to concurrent data retrieval and rendering in Swing applications.
org.jtrim2.taskgraph
Defines the core interface for the task graph execution framework.
org.jtrim2.taskgraph.basic
Defines basic implementations of the task graph execution framework.
org.jtrim2.ui.concurrent
Defines generic utility to assist concurrency in thread confined UI frameworks (such as Swing or Java FX).
org.jtrim2.ui.concurrent.query
Contains classes and interfaces related to concurrent data retrieval and rendering in GUI applications.
org.jtrim2.utils
Contains useful utility methods and classes which do not warrant their own packages.
